verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: huddled] [ARG1: with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-TMP: as aides across the globe scrambled to nail down final details of a high - stakes summit with North Korea leader Kim Jong Un] .
